Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2012 09:15PM - edited Apr 5, 2012 09:18PM by kaycancer dear kayrnic    ihad breast cancer in 2001 had surgery and was fine 9 years later in 2010 i was given the news that the cancer came back as mets stage 4 i was devastated i felt the same as you  ill tellyou what someone told me you and i dont experation dates stamped to our feet no matter our diagnosis or what the doctors say GOD is in control he has the final say so just because we have cancer that doesnt mean thats what what we will end up dying from. i ve given my life to the to GOD  since then my tumors have been shrinking the treatments are working  having mets  doesnt have to mean our lives after to end it could be the beginning of a new life there alots of new treatments now people have lived for years with cancer God also has the power to heal all things what may seem impossible to us humans is not impossible to GOD
